document.heading: Douglas Knoll, Golden Rule, 1728 W Street, and Wagner Gainesville Real Property Tax Exemption Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-204, the “Douglas Knoll, Golden Rule, 1728 W Street, and Wagner Gainesville Real Property Tax Exemption Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-832. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 28, 2014, and Nov. 18, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 8, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-500 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-204 became effective on Mar. 10, 2015.
